name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Job Connections Project Job Application Autofill Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension created by the Job Connections Project to help job seekers more quickly fill out job applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a free tool provided to job seekers by the non-profit organization called the Job Connections Project that allows job seekers to save information relevant to their job application process locally on their own computer then allows them to autofill future job applications with one click. We do not save/collect the data from each job seeker, this is purely a service provided to job seekers.
